headline: Charter Communications (CHTR) Earnings Expected to Grow: Should You Buy?
summary: Charter (CHTR) doesn't possess the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.

headline: Is Charter Communications (CHTR) Starting To Look Attractive After A Prolonged Share Price Slump
summary: If you are wondering whether Charter Communications at around US$192 per share is starting to look like value after a rough run, you are not alone. The stock has seen a 1% decline over the past week, a 6.1% decline over the last month, and a 46.5% decline over the past year, with a 53.1% decline over three years and 70.6% over five years. This naturally raises questions about both risk and potential future returns. Recent discussion around Charter has centered on its position in U.S...
